armorstatushud.config.client.enabled.des: Enables or disables the Armor Status HUD display.
armorstatushud.config.client.alignMode.d: Sets the position of the HUD on the screen.
armorstatushud.config.client.listMode.de: Sets the direction to display status items.
armorstatushud.config.client.showItemNam: Set to true to show item names.
armorstatushud.config.client.showDamageO: Set to true to show the standard inventory item overlay (damage bar).
armorstatushud.config.client.showItemCou: Set to true to show the item count overlay.
armorstatushud.config.client.damageColor: This is a list of percent damage thresholds and text color codes that will be used when item damage is <= the threshold. Format used: "," separates the threshold and the color code, ";" separates each pair. Valid color values are 0-9, a-f.
armorstatushud.config.client.damageDispl: Valid damageDisplayType strings are value, percent, or none.
armorstatushud.config.client.damageThres: The type of threshold to use when applying the damageColorList thresholds.
armorstatushud.config.client.showItemDam: Set to true to show held item damage values.
armorstatushud.config.client.showArmorDa: Set to true to show armor damage values.
armorstatushud.config.client.showMaxDama: Set to true to show the max damage when damageDisplayType=value.
armorstatushud.config.client.showEquippe: Set to true to show info for your currently equipped item.
armorstatushud.config.client.showOffHand: Set to true to show info for your currently offhand equipped item.
armorstatushud.config.client.xOffset.des: Horizontal offset from the edge of the screen (when using right alignments the x offset is relative to the right edge of the screen).
armorstatushud.config.client.yOffset.des: Vertical offset from the edge of the screen (when using bottom alignments the y offset is relative to the bottom edge of the screen).
armorstatushud.config.client.yOffsetBott: Vertical offset used only for the bottomcenter alignment to avoid the vanilla HUD.
armorstatushud.config.client.applyXOffse: Set to true if you want the xOffset value to be applied when using a center alignment.
armorstatushud.config.client.applyYOffse: Set to true if you want the yOffset value to be applied when using a middle alignment.
Set to true to show info when chat is open, false to disable info when chat is open.
